Dear Sheffield City Council,
1 - Can you please provide a list of statutory and related non-discretionary expenditure provided by you with the statutory obligation and budgets for the same for each of the last 5 years, and actual expenditure against each item to show any variance.
2 - Can you please provide a list of itemised discretionary expenditure with budgets for each of the last 5 years, and actual expenditure against each item to show any variance.
3 - Can you please provide your budgeted breakdown for council tax enforcement costs resulting from your obligations under the Schedule 12 3(2) of the Local Government Act 1992 together with actual costs for each item to show any variance for each of the last 5 years.
Yours faithfully,
Tracey Smith

Dear Tracey Smith,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Budgets and
Expenditures which we received on 05/09/2023.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 03/10/2023. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council

Sheffield, S1 1UJ

Dear Tracey Smith,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Budgets and
Expenditures which we received on 05/09/2023.
Please find Sheffield City Council’s response to your request set out
below:
1 - Can you please provide a list of statutory and related
non-discretionary expenditure provided by you with the statutory
obligation and budgets for the same for each of the last 5 years, and
actual expenditure against each item to show any variance.
Sheffield City Council do not hold this information.
2 - Can you please provide a list of itemised discretionary expenditure
with budgets for each of the last 5 years, and actual expenditure against
each item to show any variance.
Sheffield City Council do not hold this information.
3 - Can you please provide your budgeted breakdown for council tax
enforcement costs resulting from your obligations under the Schedule 12
3(2) of the Local Government Act 1992 together with actual costs for each
item to show any variance for each of the last 5 years.
Please find attached a breakdown of Summons costs, which were last
reviewed in 2019.
If you have any queries about this response, please do not hesitate to
contact us.
The information provided in this response is available for re-use under
the terms of the Open Government Licence v3.0. The terms of the OGL can be
found [1]here. When re-using the information, Sheffield City Council
requires you to include the following attribution statement: “Contains
public sector information obtained from Sheffield City Council and
licensed under the Open Government Licence v3.0.”
If you are unhappy with the response you have received in relation to your
request, you are entitled to have this reviewed. You can ask for an
internal review by replying to this email. Internal review requests should
be submitted within 40 working days from the date of this response.
If you remain dissatisfied with the outcome of your internal review, you
can contact the Information Commissioner’s Office. Please see
[2]
https://ico.org.uk/make-a-complaint/offi...
for further details.
Kind Regards,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
